name: Vanillo Red Theme
description:
A simple, Red Theme for https://www.vanillo.co.
This theme is still in active development and may undergo major changes in the future. Stay tuned!
Made by WhiteStroke & TheCreator
additional_info:
+ = Added
- = Removed
* = Fixed

Patchlog:

Version v0.1:
* Several list entries recolored so they are actually visible
+ Rounded search bar
+ Rounded category cards
+ Several texts have been recolored
+ Icon colors changed (e.g. like/dislike button, verification icon)
+ Active button colors changed to red
* Beta warning popup removed

Version v0.02:
+ Changed Header Color
+ Changed Video Color
* Video Page

Version v0.01:
+ Changed Main Colors
+ Changed Main Text
+ Changed Logo Color
+ Changed Header Color
